cerebralcortex.examples.util package¶

Submodules¶

cerebralcortex.examples.util.data_helper module¶

cerebralcortex.examples.util.data_helper.gen_phone_battery_data(user_id) → object[source]¶

Create pyspark dataframe with some sample phone battery data :returns: pyspark dataframe object with columns: [“timestamp”, “offset”, “battery_level”, “ver”, “user”] :rtype: DataFrame

cerebralcortex.examples.util.data_helper.gen_phone_battery_metadata(stream_name) → cerebralcortex.core.metadata_manager.stream.metadata.Metadata[source]¶

Create Metadata object with some sample metadata of phone battery data :returns: metadata of phone battery stream :rtype: Metadata
